description: Authentication endpoint accepting username/password credentials via GET parameters on index.php
notes: CRITICAL SECURITY ISSUES: 1) Credentials transmitted via GET method (visible in URL, browser history, server logs), 2) Error message leaks information ('you are not the admin' confirms role existence), 3) PHP 5.6.40 is end-of-life with known vulnerabilities, 4) Potential SQL injection attack surface, 5) No visible CSRF protection, 6) Missing security headers (X-Frame-Options, CSP, HSTS, X-Content-Type-Options)
